Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-11021 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.0.4-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-11021 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.0.4-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsoup is earlier than 3.0.4-10, affected by CVE-2025-11021
